en_title: School Mediation Seminar cum Prize Presentation Ceremony of Mediation Essay Competition 2020 held today (with photos)
zh_title: 校園調解研討會暨2020年調解徵文比賽頒獎典禮今日舉行（附圖）

en: The School Mediation Seminar cum the Prize Presentation Ceremony of the Mediation Essay Competition 2020 co-organised by the Department of Justice, Education Bureau, Rotary International District 3450 and Asia Conflict Resolution Institute was held today (November 21).

The theme of the School Mediation Seminar was "Mediate your way out of school disputes". Through an armchair discussion, speakers from diverse backgrounds including law, mediation, teaching and social work discussed the use of mediation for disputes in the school context. There was also a sharing session by the winning students of the competition on their essays and their views on resolving conflicts amicably. The seminar ended with a Prize Presentation Ceremony.

The seminar was well-received by the education sector. It was hoped that through the seminar, students, parents, teachers and other education workers could all gain an in-depth understanding of mediation and the values behind it, thereby developing a positive and constructive approach in respect of conflict resolution for school disputes.
The seminar and the Prize Presentation Ceremony was broadcast online. For more information and details, please visit www.legalhub.gov.hk/events_detail.php?a=116.
zh: 由律政司、教育局、國際扶輪3450地區和亞洲排解爭端學院合辦的校園調解研討會暨2020年調解徵文比賽頒獎典禮今日（十一月二十一日）舉行。
校園調解研討會的主題為「校園爭議莫苦惱調解為你拓出路」。在討論環節中，來自不同背景的講者（包括律師、調解員、老師和社工）就着在校園中如何使用調解來解決爭議作出討論。另外，研討會還包括一個學生分享環節，由得獎學生分享他們的文章以及他們對友好解決爭議的看法。研討會最後以頒獎典禮作結。
研討會受到教育界的廣泛支持，希望透過是次研討會，能夠令學生、家長、老師和其他教育工作者對調解及其背後的意義和理念有更深入的了解，從而就着校園爭議建立一套正面及具建設性的解決爭議方法。
研討會和頒獎典禮均在網上直播。有關活動詳情，請瀏覽www.legalhub.gov.hk/events_detail.php?a=116&l=tc。
